item.title: First post
item.description: Introduction Welcome to my first attempt at writing a page with hugo! I found a nice tutorial and I also wanted a personal web page / blog so… here we are. If you actually found my website it either means two things: You saw my CV because I sent it to your company, were curious and found this mess of a site. Congratulations, here’s a virtual cookie for you. You know me personally… hello!
